trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> event, you can perform any additional preprocessing required or cancel the database query entirely.
trans-unit.target: 加入事件處理常式委派以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>事件，您可以執行任何所需的額外處理，或完全取消資料庫查詢。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Because the SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> class, you can cancel a pending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 因為 SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs 類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>類別，您可以取消暫止<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>資料庫查詢，藉由設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can examine and manipulate the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> collection, and other database query properties prior to running the query by accessing the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢視和管理<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>集合，以及其他資料庫查詢屬性來存取執行查詢之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>所公開物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method by accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法藉由存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method to provide access to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query before it is run.
trans-unit.target: SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs 類別用來<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>方法以提供存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>之前執行資料庫查詢。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項不僅會公開許多您可以使用基礎資料物件的資料作業過程中處理的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的事件，以及相關聯<xref:System.EventArgs>類別和事件處理常式委派。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: |事件 |EventArgs |事件處理常式 | |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前擷取的資料。 |SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: 發生之前插入、 更新或刪除作業會執行。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operation completes.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: 插入、 更新或刪除作業完成後擷取資料，會發生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object and any <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref>類別，使用指定<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>物件和任何<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: `inputParameters`參數是<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>符合中方法簽章和傳址方式傳遞的名稱/值組的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the cancelable <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> query.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref>物件，表示可取消<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>查詢。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>物件傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>物件傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: You can examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object to determine whether sorting, paging, or a row count are requested as part of the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件來判斷是否排序、 分頁或資料列計數要求做為資料擷取作業的一部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> perform additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>類別來要求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>執行結果集，例如排序資料，或傳回特定資料子集上的其他資料相關作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這些資料相關作業列舉的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object is specified during <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> creation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>物件，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>有<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>物件期間指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref>建立。
